channel.title: SFoL2: Regicide I [Day 6]
channel.description:
##Welcome to Special Forum of Lies 2
The King has been murdered, and the castle has been thrown into disarray!
**Rules**
1. Follow the [Global Forum Rules](http://forum.imperium42.com/t/global-forum-rules-please-read-first/244) 2. Be respectful 3. Don't be inactive - if you are, I'll PM you; If you don't respond and start posting in-game, you will be replaced 4. Do not quote/screenshot private host messages 5. Don't throw the game 6. It's a game - have fun 7: This game [u]will not start[/u] until SFoL1 has completed - no rush. 8: No editing/deleting posts, because apparently that wasn't obvious or something, idk
**Gameplay** Days will be 72 hours long, or shorter if someone dies Nights will be 24 hours long Actions are done by messaging me All factions will follow the nomenclature described [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/general-faction-changes/1289]here[/url] (yeah, it's old, it's awkward, I know, too late to change it though) The Blackrose Faction members cannot communicate with each outher outside of the game at all (however, using in-game abilities to communicate is allowed) The Psychic and Priest will talk with their targets via private messages that I will create All classes used will be found in the [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/class-cards-for-sfol/1323]SFoL Class Cards Thread[/url] Roles and factions will not flip upon death Roles (but not factions) will be revealed at the start of the game Any role can be either Azure Dragon or Blackrose Faction All Blackrose Faction members can use their night to kill as well as use their night action, but they must wait one night before killing again One Blackrose Faction member has killed the King, and must wait one night before being able to kill One player will be a Traitor, appearing to be AD but winning with BF The traitor does not know the identity of the BF members When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it The Blackrose Faction wins once they achieve majority
**Executions** To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" When someone is on Trial the thread [b][u]will be locked.[/u][/b] They will be able to post a 1000 character defense through me. Everyone will then vote Guilty or Innocent by messaging me. Executions end the day Trials pause the timer
**After The Night** You will be told what happened to you, and day will begin
**Journals** Message me your entire journal, the last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed Do not re-send a new journal every time, simply update the one you already sent.
**To Join** To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
**Rolelist:** [color=steblue]Azure Dragon[/color] [color=steblue]Azure Dragon[/color] [color=steblue]Azure Dragon[/color] [color=steblue]Azure Dragon[/color] [color=steblue]Azure Dragon[/color] [color=steblue]Azure Dragon[/color] [color=steblue]Azure Dragon[/color] [color=steblue]Azure Dragon[/color] [color=steblue]Azure Dragon[/color] [color=darkred]Traitor[/color] [color=purple]Blackrose Faction[/color] [color=purple]Blackrose Faction[/color]
**Players:** 1. Hippolytus - The Physician 2. aniketos - The Knight - **Modkilled Day 6** 3. numberFTW - The Priest 4. Damafaud - The Princess - **Killed Night 3** 5. NozBugz - The Court Wizard 6. PolikShadowbliss - The Psychic - **Killed Night 4** 7. Rogue - The Noble - **Killed Night 4** 8. gingerbeardgentleman - The Sheriff - **Killed Night 2** 9. deadfrien - The Paladin 10. PokemonKidRyan - The Prince - **Killed Night 1** 11. Ingeel - The Observer - **Killed Night 3** 12. DinoMask - The Butler
**Backups:**

item.title: SFoL2: Regicide I [Day 6]
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
I would have but it was everybody except Ingeel

That being said, an active Town would’ve destroyed the BR in this setup. You guys literally had zero lynches. Normally we use both Prosecutions within like 4 days and lynch every day, so because the game runs without a standard Day/Night cycle it ends up being fairly balanced.

@PolikShadowbliss your role was useless because you only used it once and he died the next day

Read full topic

Next time I’ll do it the right way
